title: Is there an OCE discord or club I can join?
body: I'm tired of queuing with toxic randoms. I'd love to find some nice people to play with, especially some fellow girls!

replies.body:
Summoners Society is a good place to start! Plenty of people to play with. 
- [Discord ](https://discord.gg/nQqNwpY)
- [facebook group ](https://www.facebook.com/groups/SummonersSocietyOCE/)
https://discord.gg/Nhe5JY8 decent size OCE league discord
